Title: Longlegs
Produced by:
Nicolas Cage 
 Dan Kagan 
 Brian Kavanaugh-Jones 
 Dave Caplan 
 Chris Ferguson
Production companies:
C2 Motion Picture Group 
 Saturn Films 
 Range Media Partners
Cast: Nicolas Cage as the serial killer
Production: In November 2022, it was reported that Osgood Perkins would direct from a script he wrote. Nicolas Cage signed on to produce (under his Saturn Films banner) and star in the horror thriller film as a serial killer. In February 2023, Maika Monroe signed on as FBI agent, Lee Harker. The following month, Alicia Witt and Blair Underwood joined the cast.
Principal photography took place in Vancouver, British Columbia from January 16 to February 23, 2023, with Andrés Arochi serving as cinematographer.
Release: In February 2023, Neon acquired the film's North American rights at the European Film Market. It is scheduled to be released in the United States on July 12, 2024.
